import React from 'react'; import data from '../data'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductScreen(props) { console.log(props.match.params.id); const product = data.products.findAll(x => x._id === props.match.params.id); return
Back to Result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.munReview} Review)
  • {product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}

{product.name}

} export default ProductScreen;
